title: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing watermelon in a dream: Many people like to eat watermelon in the summer, as it is characterized by its delicious and delicious taste that cools the temperature and also helps in weight loss, as it is rich in fiber and water that speed up the feeling of fullness, but when you see watermelon in a dream it is a quality that does not wear out and expands one’s livelihood. It answers the categories of others. Let us read about it the sayings of scholars such as Ibn Sirin in different cases, whether for single or married men. Women.Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. When you see a watermelon in a dream and it is ripe and red in color, this is a sign that you will reap the fruits of fatigue and pressure after many years, or it indicates the arrival of a great king, whether it is prestigious positions in society that have been seized or whose influence and power has increased. In the country he rules.Dream of eating watermelonMany great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen gathered that the symbol of watermelon in a dream could be related to the emotional state of the dreamer, as it shows that he is going through a state of glowing feelings and desire for the opposite sex. . Signs: First: Disappointment and failure, whether in education, commerce, or emotion. Second: Separation of loved ones and the feeling of losing them. Third: Psychological and physical illnesses, negative energy, and many fears that follow. If the dreamer sees that his house contains a lot of watermelon fruits, then the vision It shows the death of people from his family with the same number of watermelons that appeared in the vision, which means that if three watermelons appear, three people will die. The dreamer's house and so on. If the dreamer sees a waterfall in his dream and the vision is in the summer, then the dream has three signs: First: You will soon share a luxurious life with him, and he will feel comfortable and relaxed in it. Second: He has the quality of maturity, and the more mature a person is, the more stable his life will be, because Recklessness and immaturity make life filled with a lot of turmoil and conflicts. Third: For the dreamer to be a reason to change the lives of others for the better, it may be a reason to lead one to the path of truth and away from lies and deception, and it may lead one to get out of a major problem or debt that almost landed him in prison. His help to others will be in the form of providing practical advice that applies in life, and this will facilitate the process of changing their lives for the better. Al-Nabulsi gave countless interpretations of this symbol and said that the person who sees a watermelon in his dream will soon be overwhelmed with sadness. If it rains a lot of watermelon in the sky and the dreamer takes a quantity of it In a dream, the metaphorical analogy for this scene is that he wanted something from a person with a high status in society, and this person will give him what he asked for and soon he will meet his need. There are many types of watermelon, and one of its types is called Indian watermelon. It can appear in the dreamer’s dream. The jurists pointed out that It is not good to see him in a dream and it shows that the dreamer is an unacceptable person in the dream. The eyes of the people, like many, describe him as a despicable character. The Antichrist or the magician who is known for bewitching others and destroying their lives with it. If he sees the symbol of magic in his dream

If he sees the symbol of magic in his dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a married woman without a groom

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a wedding dress for a married woman without a groom. Dreams are considered one of the most mysterious things that worry many people and can cause them discomfort or control their mood during the day and urge them to think about the details of what they saw in the dream, especially since dream events often They are imaginary, but they are linked to reality, and the people who appear in the dream are present in the dreamer’s reality, so there seems to be a link between dreams and reality. Many psychologists and religious scholars have been interested in developing interpretations that are as close as possible to the logic of dreams, and in our next article we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about a dress. Wedding for a married woman without a groom. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a wedding dress: In real life, wearing a white dress in general and a wedding dress in particular shows joy, positivity, purity, renewal and life, but things are often different compared to dreams. She will accept him. Wearing the dress in the next life indicates her purity, and seeing a wedding in a dream indicates happy news and joy that will overwhelm the life of the dreamer. Dreaming of a wedding dress for a married woman. There are many interpretations of seeing a married woman’s wedding dress, and the interpretations differ depending on the person who is getting married in the dream. Of the grace and kindness that awaits her, and if the woman who dreams is pregnant in reality and sees a wedding dress, this means that she will have the gender of the baby that she wants, and if the woman sees herself wearing a wedding dress without attending the wedding celebrations of guests, this means that she will make the right decisions in her life. Interpretation of a dream Wedding dress for a married womanWe can be sure that seeing a married woman's wedding dress carries many positive signs and happiness and is a strong and promising sign that the future will be beautiful and promising. If a woman sees that she is wearing an injured and unclean dress, this reflects signs of her illness and her health fluctuates a little, and if the woman who dreams of a white dress wants to give birth, this is good news. A dream of a wedding dress for a married woman without a groom. The details that fill the dream and that the mind focuses on and retains after waking up may be It has important implications and is what the dreamer is looking for for an interpretation, because it is the strangest of situations and is often imaginary. An explanation of the meaning of seeing a wedding dress without the groom is as follows: As stated in Ibn Sirin’s book on the interpretation of dreams, seeing a married woman at a wedding wearing a white dress without the presence of Jesus, this indicates her good intentions, her good reputation among the people, and her good reputation. Seeing the same married woman Wearing a wedding dress may indicate the medical and loving relationship between her and her husband. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream without the groom means abundant and immediate goodness that the dreamer will receive. It can indicate the good condition of the nipple’s children, their success in life, and her enjoyment of their successes. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a white dress for a woman Married Ibn Sina also mentions in his book that a woman’s vision of the wedding, singing and dancing is in manna

title: Interpretation of seeing a police station in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing the police station in a dream symbolizes hostilities and disagreements, and dreaming of entering the police station indicates that you are entering into distress and crises, and whoever sees that he has left the police station in a dream, this indicates the end of his crises and problems. Continue reading the article to find out the interpretation of a dream about a police station. Interpretation of seeing a police station in a dream. Seeing a police station in a dream means disputes, problems, and hostilities. Filing a complaint at the police station in a dream indicates a claim for rights and entitlements, as going to the police station in a dream means falling into danger, and whoever sees Himself sitting in the police station in a dream, this indicates worry and worry. Anxiety and a dream of waiting at the police station indicate searching for solutions to problems. A dream about working at a police station indicates the beginning of disputes with others. Crying at the police station in a dream indicates the release of worries and sorrows. However, whoever sees that he is afraid in the police station in a dream is safe and finds comfort after being tired. Seeing the police station empty of people in a dream means stability in the country, but seeing the police station full of people in a dream indicates the absence of safety and security. If you dream that you are taking someone to the police station, this means that you will get into trouble and the emergence of new hostilities, but if One sees a policeman taking him to the police station in a dream, then this indicates the presence of opponents and enemies around him. Whoever sees the police station dark in a dream, this indicates torment and terror, and seeing the police station cramped in a dream means being exposed to intrigues and harm, but if you see a large police station in In a dream, this indicates instability. Interpretation of a dream about entering the police station: Seeing yourself entering the police station in a dream means that you are entering into distress and distress. If you see yourself entering the police station while you are handcuffed in a dream, this indicates a lack of ingenuity in finding solutions to get out of distress, and whoever dreams That he forcibly entered the police station in a dream, then he will be in a dream. Distress and distress. To obtain his rights. Whoever sees himself entering the police station while he is afraid in a dream, then he is safe from what he is afraid of and is stable in his life. However, if you see yourself entering the police station while sad in the dream, this indicates that you will face many difficulties. Entering the police station with competitors in a dream indicates... New problems and quarrels with them, and dreaming of entering the police station with relatives indicates the outbreak of disputes between them. A brother entering the police station in a dream indicates that he will face many problems, and if you see your father entering the police station in a dream, this indicates many fears and responsibilities on his shoulders. Leaving the police station in a dream. Leaving the police station in a dream indicates the end of crises and an escape from distress. Whoever sees that he cannot leave the police station in a dream, this indicates that he did not find the appropriate solutions to his problems. Whoever sees that he left the police station happy in a dream, he will overcome the difficulties and escape. From worries, and whoever sees that he left the police station tired in a dream, this indicates that he will find comfort after extreme fatigue. Seeing a familiar person...

title: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream for an unmarried woman, interpretation for different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream with a single woman Interpretation In different cases, a person can see in his mother a quarrel between him and those around him or between people he does not know and has not experienced embarrassing situations with. Such dreams are often the result of the viewer's psychological instability, lack of comfort, and tension from people or things happening around him, but he cannot change them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight in a dream for a single woman. A promising vision for an unmarried girl is to see that she is arguing with someone In a dream, their voices rise during a quarrel. Aspire to her. Some interpreters said that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is arguing with her mother, then this dream symbolizes the feelings that this girl has toward her mother and that she loves her very much. Likewise, if a girl sees that she is arguing with her brothers, then this dream It indicates that the girl loves her brothers very much and feels all feelings of pride and honor towards them. If the girl sees that she is arguing with someone and the dispute is devoid of inappropriate words, then this dream indicates that in reality this girl feels emotional need and cannot find the right person who She shares her life and feelings with him. If an unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with one of the sons, this dream means that her family life is unstable and that her relationship with her parents and siblings suffers from a lot of feelings of tension and pressure, and this is evidence of that. . That the girl is more willing to please her parents, obey them, obey them, and not do things that make them angry. An unpleasant vision for an unmarried girl is to see in her dream that she is arguing with a friend, and this dream indicates that there will be some disagreements between her and this person, but they will disappear soon, Because the bond of friendship always remains. . Stronger than fleeting disagreements. An unmarried girl who sees that she is arguing with someone in a dream and slaps her in the face, this vision is considered a promising vision, because it shows that the person who sees feelings of love for this girl. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight with a stranger over a person in a dream if she sees a girl If an unmarried woman dreams that she is arguing with a stranger she does not know, then this dream symbolizes the problems that this girl faces, which make her feel afraid and anxious and promises to get rid of them. . These problems will come soon, God willing. The girl who sees this vision must approach God Almighty and ask for His help in everything that harms her, as well as take means to ward off this evil. It is also a promising vision for an unmarried girl to see in her dream that she is fighting with someone she does not know, as this vision indicates that God Almighty will grant her ample sustenance soon. A promising vision for a girl is that she sees in her dream that she is arguing with someone she does not know, and this person hits her on the hand. This dream symbolizes that the next time someone proposes to the girl, she will feel comfortable with him and their marriage will happen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a quarrel with one’s father in a dream for a single woman. Among the warning dreams for an unmarried girl

title: Interpretation of dreams about rain falling from the roof of a house

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain falling from the roof of the house in a dream for a single girl: Rain water falling from the roof in a dream usually indicates that this girl will get a lot of money without putting in much effort. Or that seeing rain falling from the roof of the house may symbolize the approaching engagement of this girl. The official girl is the guy she wants to be in a relationship with. A girl who is studying at this stage and who sees rain falling in her house will excel and all her family members will be happy for her. Seeing light rain falling in this girl’s house indicates that this girl has abandoned the actions and taboos that she had undertaken. With it and made her closer to God Almighty. Seeing light rain falling inside the house also symbolizes the abundance of happy news coming this girl’s way. If this girl is suffering from depression, sadness, or anxiety, then the light rain falling from the roof of her house indicates: Get rid of These negative feelings significantly improve her psyche. But if this girl is not working and wants to find a suitable job, then the rainwater falling on her house indicates that she will find a good job in the coming days. In the event of heavy and destructive rain, this girl will go through many Of the difficult obstacles and crises in the coming days. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of rain falling in the courtyard of a house for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing rain falling from the roof of the house in a dream for a married woman. Rain falling on a married woman’s house expresses the multiplicity of good morals and the abundance of lawful sustenance that will come to her. Rain also indicates In her dream, there is a state of emotional stability between her and her husband. It is said that the interpretation of a dream about rain falling from the roof of the house symbolizes the liberation of this woman from the debts and financial problems that she was going through. Or the rain may be a sign that this woman hears important news that may change her appearance. Her life is for the better. However, heavy rain falling on her house indicates many successive crises that she and her family will face. Also, heavy rain in a dream indicates a lot of bad news that this woman will hear. As for light rain, it indicates that this woman has gone through changes. Many positive things in her life. Interpretation of a dream about rain falling from the roof of a house in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is said that the interpretation of a dream about rain falling from the roof of a house often foretells this woman an easy birth. Seeing rain falling on the house also symbolizes the liberation of this woman from sorrows, worries, and feelings of stress. The heavy rain is a warning sign to monitor her health, otherwise she will miscarry. Or it may be heavy rain, as this woman hastens to make the decisions she makes in her life in general. As for the rain falling on the roof of her house and her feeling happy, she is happy because She will give birth to the gender of the baby she wants. As for the disastrous rain that a pregnant woman experiences on the roof of her house, it may indicate that she will be exposed to many financial problems in the near future. Fall often indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying tears for a married woman

preview.html: The vision may differ in its interpretation depending on the situation in which the tears were seen, so through today’s article we will tell you the interpretation of the dream of crying with tears in detail. Follow the lines below with us to find out the interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of crying tears by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that if a married woman sees in a dream that she is crying. It indicates The dream indicates love, affection, happiness, and stability in this period. It can be evidence of money and livelihood that will come soon. And if she desires to have children, God will soon grant her whatever she desires. But if the dreamer sees that he is crying with blood, the dream indicates that he has repented of his sins, and returns To God Almighty for what he is doing. The vision indicates the arrival of good news that will change his life and make him live a life full of happiness. If the dreamer has desires and desires to fulfill them and sees the vision, all his desires will come true soon. And if the dreamer sees that he is crying, slapping, and wearing black. It indicates The vision indicates the sorrows and worries that the dreamer faces in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about crying tears in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that if a married woman sees her husband crying in a dream, she faces many problems. The vision indicates the collapse of worries and problems. If the husband wants to travel and sees this vision. It indicates achieving what a person wants and enjoying goodness, blessings and money. What if a woman sees that she is crying and cuts off her clothes. The vision shows that he is committing sins and wants to repent of sins and return to God. Seeing him crying and screaming in a dream is good news for him. He sees the happy and joyful news that will come to him soon. See also: Interpretation of dreams about crying over the dead. Interpretation of a dream about crying tears for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is crying with tears. This vision is a sign of abundant sustenance and blessing that will soon come to the dreamer. But if she sees an unknown person crying in a dream. The dream shows that she is thinking a lot. There is something that preoccupies her and makes her unhappy. If a woman sees in a dream that her father is crying with tears. The vision shows a lot of money that she gets from her father. And if a married woman sees that she is crying with tears, but she wipes away her tears with her hand. The vision is a harbinger of the fulfillment of desires, dreams and aspirations. title: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Prayer is the most important pillar of Islam and one of the pillars of religion, and a person can see in his dream that he is praying. Less: Interpretation of the dream of prayer by Ibn Sirin. The origin of the dream of prayer is that it is a dream worthy of praise and has many implications, because the dawn prayer is a harbinger of the fulfillment of desires, and the noon prayer is a sign of the arrival or completion of a long-awaited relationship. While the sunset prayer indicates the need for the dreamer, it is performed by the will of God Almighty. While the evening prayer is a sign of sustenance and concealment, the Friday prayer is a sign of relief and concealment. It relieves distress, and God knows best. In addition to the above, the Eid prayer is an announcement of the return of the newcomer, while the Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha prayers have different meanings, and the first indicates good behavior in them. The second is paying off the dreamer’s debts and knowing God better. Interpretation of a dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s prayer indicates Prayer in the dreamer's dream refers to the supplication that is answered to satisfy the desires that a person has always wanted to achieve from God Almighty. And whoever sees in his dream that he is a righteous imam, this indicates that he will reach a high rank or will obtain money. What was said about the harm of this dream, if one sees In a dream that he is praying in an unclean place, this indicates that he has fallen into forbidden matters, such as sexual relations that God has forbidden, or livelihood or money. It is not permissible, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying, this is evidence of her response to prayer or good news of marriage. It indicates her country and that she will marry a righteous man, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying, then what does that mean? She is a good woman who takes care of her family, and if she does not have children, then this dream is a sign of childbirth and support. . . Good offspring, righteousness, piety, and justice. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to her child while she is praying in a dream, this indicates that her newborn will be the son of a righteous and just man. The tension has disappeared, and this indicates that salvation is destined for her and her baby, and God knows best

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing eggs in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Eggs are considered one of the basic foods that benefit the human body because they contain many nutrients, but what many people do not know is that eggs are one of the foods that carry many different meanings and interpretations that differ from one person to another. Another according to the dreamer and according to the situation in which some appeared in the dream, as we will explain to you. Interpretation of dreams about drinking coffee in a dream... good news and wisdom. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a man. Ibn Sirin says that the person who sees in front of him a plate full of immature eggs will find many good opportunities. In the work environment in the coming period. If a man finds egg yolks in a dream, this may indicate that this man will be exposed to a health problem in the near future. Collecting eggs in a dream is one of the signs that indicate the abundance of the dreamer’s livelihood and the acquisition of a lot of money. Eating Eggs are also the psychological and emotional stability in that person’s life at that time. Interpretation of a dream about a hairstyle in a dream... good things come and secrets are revealed. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman. Imam Al-Sadiq says: Chickens laying eggs in front of a married woman is good news for that woman in Imminent pregnancy, especially if that woman is late in having children. Many eggs in a married woman’s dream indicate that there is a lot of abundant nutrition on the dreamer’s path in the coming period. But breaking eggs in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are many marital problems in her life. This woman is between her and her husband, which may lead to divorce. Interpretation of a dream about cutting meat in a dream... getting rid of worries and the success of his business. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a pregnant womanDream interpreters say that hatching eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the clear signs of an approaching date. Childbirth for this woman. But if the dreamer is in the first months of pregnancy, then breaking eggs in the dream indicates that this pregnancy is not complete. Eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. Ripe eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream are signs that indicate An easy and simple birth for this woman. Interpretation of dreams of falling into water in a dream.. joy and good health come. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a single girl. Dream interpreters believe that eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream are among the signs that indicate the approach of formal engagement for this girl, either Through marriage or engagement. Ripe eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate that this girl is currently living in a state of emotional and psychological stability. If an unmarried girl sees that an unknown man gives her eggs in a dream, this means that he wants to marry her. Breaking eggs in The dream of an unmarried girl is one of the dreams that indicate that this girl will suffer from an injury to her dignity from her lover in the coming period. Many white eggs in one girl’s dream indicate the multiplicity of loyal friends present in this girl’s life. Interpretation of the dream of death in a dream...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Zaghloul dove in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream is evidence of love, honesty, and good relations between the dreamer and his family. Likewise, seeing a ginger pigeon in a dream and its color is white, means sustenance with money and obtaining goodness. Seeing a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream is evidence of success and success that the dreamer will obtain, and evidence On the fulfillment of desires. Slaughtering a zaghloul in a dream is a praiseworthy vision and a sign of a speedy recovery and liberation from worries and sorrows. Seeing the slaughter of a zaghalul in a dream also for an unmarried young man is evidence of his imminent engagement and marriage, and that he will obtain a just wife. Seeing a zaghloul pigeon in a dream for a single woman indicates the interpretation of the vision A dove in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will hear good and happy news in her next life. Seeing a dove in girls’ dreams in general also indicates purity, chastity, and loyalty to one’s family. Seeing a black dove in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates problems, difficulties, and fears that she faces. It indicates A slaughtered pigeon in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the sorrows and dangers that she will be exposed to during this period. Seeing a Janglo pigeon cooking for a girl in a dream means that her engagement and marriage with someone she loves is close. Seeing a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream for a married woman indicates that she She will have children. Seeing a Zaghloul dove in a dream is one of the desired visions and indicates the goodness and livelihood that she will obtain. Seeing a slaughtered dove in a dream indicates that she is facing problems with her husband and his family. Raising a Zaghloul pigeon in a dream for a married woman is a thankful dream and indicates benefit and blessing. Seeing a Zaghloul dove in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a Zaghloul dove in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth easily without any problems. A white dove in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the visions that indicate that she will be blessed with a male child who will have an important role. Buying a dove in a dream is generally for a woman. A pregnant woman is evidence that she will get a living and money. Interpretation of fear of pigeons in a dream: Seeing someone in a dream that he is afraid of pigeons in a dream indicates that there will be some changes in his future life. Seeing fear of a large pigeon in a dream is an unpleasant vision that may indicate Misfortunes and death. The interpretation of seeing fear of pigeons in a dream indicates that you hear good news and great sadness and fear. Interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a pigeon’s nest in a dream explains the dreamer’s many social relationships with people. Seeing a pigeon’s nest in a dream is one of the desired dreams and indicates children. And righteous caliphs. A pigeon’s nest in a dream is considered a sign of kindness, living and gaining a lot of money by the dreamer. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.
